field.label: Pass/Block rule:
field.help: Select if the rule is Pass or Block

field.label: FROM : FQDN or IP/CIDR:
field.help: FQDN or IP/CIDR CIDR is Mandatory in case of IP

field.label: TO : FQDN or IP/CIDR:
field.help: FQDN or IP/CIDR CIDR is Mandatory in case of IP

field.label: TO : target Port or Service:
field.help: Could be a port number between 1 to 65535 Or Service name (http, https, ssh)

field.label: Log Type
field.help: Used to control logging. Accepted keywords are connect, disconnect, data, error, ioop, and tcpinfo. The default is no logging.

field.label: Protocol:
field.help: The rule applies to the given protocols. Valid values are tcp and udp. The default is all supported protocols that can apply to the given commands.

field.label: Client Method:
field.help:
A list of acceptable authentication methods for client-rules, listed in order of preference. These are authentication methods that are to be checked immediately after the SOCKS client has connected to Dante, and before any socks-negotiation has started.
Supported values are pam.address, pam.any, none, and rfc931
